name: spacial-rend
caption: Spacial Rend

effect.short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  User's [critical hit]{mechanic:critical-hit} rate is one level higher when using this move.

flavorText:
The user tears the target along with the space
around it. Critical hits land more easily.
